data.title: Lena R (Randles) Barnett (1891-1979)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Explore genealogy for Lena (Randles) Barnett born 1891 Guernsey, Guernsey, Ohio, United States died 1979  including research + descendants + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Daughter of [father unknown] and [mother unknown]

[sibling(s) unknown]

Descendants

Died 7 Feb 1979 at age 87 [location unknown]

Profile last modified 21 Jul 2024

This page has been accessed 7 times.

Biography

Lena R Randles was born on 10 November 1891 in Guernsey, Guernsey, Ohio, United States, daughter of Samuel Owen Randles Jr. and Jennie Ravengraft.

Lena, daughter of Samuel Randles & Jennie Calihan, was born on 10 November 1891 in Guernsey, Ohio, United States.[1][2][3]

In the 1900 census Lena (age 9) was the daughter of Samuel Reynolds in Byesville, Jackson Township, Guernsey, Ohio, United States.[4]

Name Sex Race Age Status Relation Occupation Birth Place Samuel Reynolds M White 43 Married Head Ohio Jennie Reynolds F White 41 Married Wife Ohio Alice L Reynolds F White 14 Single Daughter Ohio Louis F Reynolds M White 12 Single Son Ohio Lena R Reynolds F White 9 Single Daughter Ohio Bessie L Reynolds F White 4 Single Daughter Ohio Dewy A Reynolds M White 1 Single Son Ohio

Lena (age 17), daughter of Samuel Randles & Jennie Ravenscraft, married Samuel F. Barnett (age 20) on 14 June 1909 in Guernsey, Ohio, United States.[5][6]

Lena's son Infant Barnett died on 4 February 1911 in Valley, Guernsey, Ohio.[7]

In the 1940 census Lena (age 47) was the wife of Samuel Barnett in Massillon, Stark, Ohio, United States.[8]

Name Sex Race Age Status Relation Occupation Birth Place Samuel Barnett M White 50 Married Head Ohio Lena Barnett F White 47 Married Wife Ohio

Lena died (age 87) on 7 February 1979 in Massillon, Stark, Ohio, United States.[9]

Lena died on 7 February 1979 and was buried in Massillon, Stark, Ohio, United States.[10]

Lena's daughter Mary Alice Lantzer was born.[11]
